name: Ziliang Zong
content: Ziliang Zong - Texas State University College of Science and Engineering Department of Computer Science E-mail: ziliang@txstate.edu I am a Professor of the Computer Science Department. I received the Distinguished Ph.D. Dissertation Award from Auburn University (2008), Texas State University Presidential Award for Excellence in Scholarly/Creative Activities (2015), and the Texas State University Presidential Distinction Award for Excellence in Scholarly/Creative Activities (2020). I am a general member of the Green Software Foundation. My research focuses on Energy-Efficient Computing and Systems, including Green Software Design, Green AI, Green Cloud, and Green Data Center. We welcome qualified and self-motivated students to join our group. Congratulations Congratulations for Stuart, Sarah, Andi, Jonathan, Sang, Divya, Keshav, and Cody received job offers from Google, Intel, Apple, Amazon, LinkedIn, Dell, Tesla, and Databricks! Congratulations for Aaron's and Jonas's internships at Google and Dell!
